desc.en: This adapter allows integration of Kia and Hyundai vehicles into IoBroker using the Kia UVO or Hyundai Bluelink API. It enables monitoring vehicle status, controlling the climate system, managing the battery charging process, and automating various vehicle functions directly within your smart home.
